thread.title: HBGBerg
thread.title_full: Sofacompany Sverige AB recenserad av HBGBerg

author: HBGBerg
title: HBGBerg
text: We had a great experience with SofaCompany. They have very fast and personalized response to email and phone questions. Their Stockholm showroom is beautiful and the staff is very helpful. And most importantly, we are very happy with the quality and appearance and comfort of our purchases!
